Title: File Monitor Lite
Description: File Monitor Lite monitors files selected by wildcard and make backups each time any file is modified.
HomeWiki:
File Monitor Lite
Small utility used to monitor one or more files in a directory (multiple files by wildcard path) and to backup each one on every change to a selected backup location.



Modifying (and leaving) any text field will start the file system watcher for the selected files and subsequent backup operations if any change was detected.
By default the backup process will start 1000 milliseconds after the detection and this may be configured to allow different delays (for long saves, for example 3DSMax).
